game.description: Explore the long-abandoned mines of Kragnir to uncover a hidden treasure before they are lost forever.
game.quest_giver: Grimgold Ironfist, the gruff but lovable dwarf lord.
game.reward: A chest filled with gold, gems, and rare mining tools.

tasks.description: Descend into the mines through the eastern entrance.
tasks.location: The Eastern Entrance of Kragnir's Mines
tasks.objective: Survive the initial descent without taking any damage.

tasks.description: Follow the map etched on the wall to reach the chamber with the Golden Pickaxe.
tasks.objective: Find and retrieve the Golden Pickaxe.

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous tunnels to return to the surface undetected.
tasks.location: The Labyrinthine Tunnels of Kragnir's Mines
tasks.objective: Escape without alerting any goblin or other hostile creatures.

game.title: The Quest for the Golden Pickaxe
